NK001(ka)042:1119: sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rjes 'jig rten sdug basngala mang //
NK001(ka)042:1120: 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis dbang med gnod myong na //
NK001(ka)042:1121: byang chub ched du ci phyir da bzod mi bya snyam //
NK001(ka)042:1122: lcag dbyug mtshon dang bsad dang bcings dang brdeg pa dang //
NK001(ka)042:1123: mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang //
NK001(ka)042:1124: 'jig rten sdug basngala ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa //
NK001(ka)042:1125: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas //
NK001(ka)042:1126: tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1127: stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med //
NK001(ka)042:1128: sdom pa bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug /
NK001(ka)042:1129: sems can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub bsngo //
NK001(ka)042:1130: gal te rang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub reg 'dod na //
NK001(ka)042:1131: tshul khrims 'chal cing mi mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams //
NK001(ka)042:1132: ji ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs bsngo na //
NK001(ka)042:1133: 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas //
NK001(ka)042:1134: chos gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung 'gyur pa //
NK001(ka)042:1135: . ni yon tan chos ldan rnams kyi tshul khrims don //
NK001(ka)042:1136: chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa //
NK001(ka)042:1137: 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs //
NK001(ka)042:1138: gal te byang chub sem dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang //
NK001(ka)042:1139: sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste //
NK001(ka)042:1140: sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed na //
NK001(ka)042:1141: mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya //
NK001(ka)042:1142: gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu //
NK001(ka)042:1143: spyod kyang rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'dod skyed na //
NK001(ka)042:1144: . tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin //
NK001(ka)042:1145: sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci //
NK001(ka)042:1146: tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngo la //
NK001(ka)042:1147: . yis rlom sems med cing bdag bsto. mi byed la //
NK001(ka)042:1148: nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs su spangs //
NK001(ka)042:1149: byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas barjo. //
NK001(ka)042:1150: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa //
NK001(ka)042:1151: sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces //
NK001(ka)042:1152: sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'chal //
NK001(ka)042:1153: tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med //
NK001(ka)042:1154: gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med //
NK001(ka)042:1155: 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min ga la yo. //
NK001(ka)042:1156: gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom sems med //
NK001(ka)042:1157: 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs //
NK001(ka)042:1158: sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa //
NK001(ka)042:1159: sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin //
NK001(ka)042:1160: mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med //
NK001(ka)042:1161: bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med //
NK001(ka)042:1162: chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma barlara shes nas //
NK001(ka)042:1163: bdag gi sha yang gtong la zhum pa'i sems med na //
NK001(ka)042:1164: . tshe phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos //
NK001(ka)042:1165: gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas med do //
NK001(ka)042:1166: bdag tu 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas chags //
NK001(ka)042:1167: blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ga la yo. //
NK001(ka)042:1168: ser sna can ni yi dwags gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1169: ji ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1170: . tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas //
NK001(ka)042:1171: gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong //
NK001(ka)042:1172: \nga bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra //
NK001(ka)042:1173: byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyis gling thob de lta min //
NK001(ka)042:1174: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi //
NK001(ka)042:1175: sems can ji snyed de dag kun la sbyin pa 'di //
NK001(ka)042:1176: byin par gyur cig snyam du bsams nas sbyin byin la //
NK001(ka)042:1177: . yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
NK001(ka)042:1178: sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas par byed pa med //
NK001(ka)042:1179: . ni nam du'anga rnam par smin la re ba med //
NK001(ka)042:1180: . ltar gtong la mkhas pa thams cad gtong ba ste //
NK001(ka)042:1181: chung ngu btang la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1182: srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji snyed pa //
NK001(ka)042:1183: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste de dag thams cad kyis //
NK001(ka)042:1184: 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la //
NK001(ka)042:1185: bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na //
NK001(ka)042:1186: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis //
NK001(ka)042:1187: . dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rang nas //
NK001(ka)042:1188: sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na //
NK001(ka)042:1189: yongs su bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnon //
NK001(ka)042:1190: nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang //
NK001(ka)042:1191: rin chen bee d+aur+ya gcig de kun zil gyis gnon //
NK001(ka)042:1192: de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun //
NK001(ka)042:1193: rjes su yi rang byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis gnon //
NK001(ka)042:1194: gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin nas //
NK001(ka)042:1195: de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po 'phangs med na //
NK001(ka)042:1196: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur te //
NK001(ka)042:1197: sprin med 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no //
NK001(ka)042:1199: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pas yi dwags 'gro- ba gco. //
NK001(ka)042:1200: .bul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gco. //
NK001(ka)042:1201: spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1202: sbyin pas sdug basngala gyur pa'i sems can yongs smin bye. //
NK001(ka)042:1203: khrims kyi dud 'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang //
NK001(ka)042:1204: mi khom brgyad spong de yis dal ba brtag tu rnye. //
NK001(ka)042:1205: bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te //
NK001(ka)042:1206: gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1207: brtson 'grus kyi ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1208: ye shes mtha' yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1209: bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smon pa 'dor //
NK001(ka)042:1210: rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub //
NK001(ka)042:1211: shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas //
NK001(ka)042:1212: khams gsum ma lus pa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur //
NK001(ka)042:1213: mi yi khyu mchog 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas nas //
NK001(ka)042:1214: sdug basngala zad par bya phyir 'gro- la chos kyang ston //
NK001(ka)042:1216: chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de //
NK001(ka)042:1218: yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su 'dzin //
NK001(ka)042:1219: sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin //
NK001(ka)042:1220: de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin //
NK001(ka)042:1221: 'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog gyur pa //
NK001(ka)042:1222: shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'di gsungs te //
NK001(ka)042:1223: ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub lam //
NK001(ka)042:1224: lam 'di sems can kun gyis thob par bya phyir bshad //
NK001(ka)042:1226: 'phags pa shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
NK001(ka)042:1227: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+y+aa ka ra sing ha dang /
